lines.text: Now swear by the sacred gods of Egypt, that you will never rest until the last remaining member of the Banning family is destroyed.
The moon rides high in the sky again, Kharis; there's death in the night air. Your work begins.
Whether you can believe it or not, the facts are here and we've got to face them. A creature that's been alive for over 3,000 years is in this town.
